channel.title: docker on My blog
channel.description: Recent content in docker on My blog

item.title: How to create a Minecraft server using Docker
item.description: Introduction I want to create a Minecraft server using docker. For this tutorial, I’ll use Minecraft version 1.16.1. The goal of this tutorial: Create a Minecraft server Use Docker to run the server in a container Being able to select the version of the server The API Minecraft has an API to access and retrieve every available version. The version manifest is available here, as you can see it’s a plain json file that contains all versions published.
